item.title: Cultural feast marks Mungaru Habba in Raichur, Bijapur
item.description:
<![CDATA[Raichur/Bijapur, Jun 14: The Mungaru Samskritika Raichur Habba, a monsoon fest, kicked off with a lively and colourful procession through the major streets of Raichur with various troupes performing cultural forms of dance such as Veeragase, Dollu Kunitha and other forms of dance.
The Raichur habba is a three-day annual cultural festival organised in Raichur by Munnuru Kapu community. This festival marks Karahunnime ' when the sowing of Kharif crops commences in the region of Karnataka.
